languages.text: Until the end of combat, enemies {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} by the Navigator suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} damage from all {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} them.
languages.original_text: Противники, которым навигатор нанес {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, получают +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} дополнительного урона от любых {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атак по возможности{/g} до конца боя и не могут от них {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Enemies damaged by the Navigator until the end of combat suffer an additional +<u>(Navigator's PER bonus)</u> damage from all attacks of opportunity and cannot dodge them.
Until the end of combat, enemies damaged by the Navigator suffer an additional +<u>Navigator's PER bonus</u> damage from all attacks of opportunity and cannot dodge them.

Until the end of combat, enemies {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} by the Navigator suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} damage from all {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} them.

Until the end of combat, enemies damaged by the Navigator suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} damage from all {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} them.

languages.text: Противники, которым навигатор нанес {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, получают +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} дополнительного урона от любых {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атак по возможности{/g} до конца боя и не могут от них {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, enemies {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} by the Navigator suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} damage from all {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} them.

traits.locale_text: Противники, которым навигатор нанес урон, получают +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВОС навигатора</u> дополнительного урона от любых атак по возможности до конца боя и не могут от них уклониться.
Противники, которым навигатор нанес урон, получают +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВОС навигатора</u> дополнительного урона от любых атак по возможности до конца боя и не могут от них уклониться.
Противники, которым навигатор нанес урон, получают +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} дополнительного урона от любых атак по возможности до конца боя и не могут от них уклониться.

languages.text: 所有在战斗中受到导航者{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}的敌人，承受{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}时都会额外受到{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}点伤害，且无法{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}借机攻击。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, enemies {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} by the Navigator suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} damage from all {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} them.

traits.locale_text: 所有在战斗中受到导航者伤害的敌人，承受{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}时都会受到额外伤害，等同于<u>导航者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>，且无法{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}借机攻击。此效果持续至战斗结束为止。
所有在战斗中受到导航者伤害的敌人，承受{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}时都会受到额外伤害，等同于{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}，且无法{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}借机攻击。此效果持续至战斗结束为止。

languages.text: Hasta el final del combate, los enemigos {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dañados{/g} por el navegante sufren +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} de daño adicional de todos los {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} y no pueden {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivarlos{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, enemies {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} by the Navigator suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} damage from all {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} them.

traits.locale_text: Hasta el final del combate, los enemigos {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dañados{/g} por el navegante sufren +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} de daño adicional de todos los {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} y no pueden {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivarlos{/g}.

Hasta el final del combate, los enemigos dañados por el navegante sufren +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} de daño adicional de todos los {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataques de oportunidad{/g} y no pueden {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquivarlos{/g}.

languages.text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erleiden Feinde, denen der Navigator {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zugefügt hat, zusätzlich +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} Schaden durch alle {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} und können ihnen nicht {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, enemies {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} by the Navigator suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} damage from all {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} them.

traits.locale_text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erleiden Feinde, denen der Navigator {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zugefügt hat, zusätzlich +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} Schaden durch alle {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} und können ihnen nicht {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g}.

Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erleiden vom Navigator beschädigte Gegner zusätzlich +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} Schaden durch alle {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} und können ihnen nicht {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}ausweichen{/g}.

languages.text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, les ennemis auxquels le Navigator a infligé des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} subissent +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} points de dégâts supplémentaires lors de toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} et ne peuvent pas les {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, enemies {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} by the Navigator suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} damage from all {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} them.

traits.locale_text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, les ennemis auxquels le Navigateur a infligé des dégâts subissent +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} du Navigateur</u> points de dégâts supplémentaires lors de toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaques d'opportunité{/g} et ne peuvent pas les {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiver{/g}.

Jusqu'à la fin du combat, les ennemis auxquels le Navigateur a infligé des dégâts subissent +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} points de dégâts supplémentaires lors de toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaques d'opportunité{/g} et ne peuvent pas les {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiver{/g}.

languages.text: 戦闘終了まで、航宙士に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けた敵は、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}から受けるダメージが +unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}され、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}できなくなる。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, enemies {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} by the Navigator suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} damage from all {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} them.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘終了まで、航宙士にダメージを受けた敵は、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}から受けるダメージが +<u>航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>され、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}できなくなる。
戦闘終了まで、航宙士にダメージを受けた敵は、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}から受けるダメージが +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}され、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}できなくなる。
